com.github.rmielnik.list

Class ViewHolderFactoryRegistry

  • com.github.rmielnik.list.ViewHolderFactoryRegistry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ViewHolderFactory<T>

    public class ViewHolderFactoryRegistry
implements ViewHolderFactory<T>

    Util class for creating customizable and easy to use ViewHolderFactory.

    In order to configure class ViewHolderFactoryRegistry you need to provide rules how to create class AbstractViewHolder for given interface RecyclerItem. You do this by calling one of register or registerSafe methods.

    There are three ways to provide a rule to class ViewHolderFactoryRegistry. Assuming that:

    • registry is some class ViewHolderFactoryRegistry instance

    • ItemA is a class implementing interface RecyclerItem that as a RecyclerItem.viewHolderType=R.layout.item_a

    • AViewHolder is a class extending class AbstractViewHolder

    You can use one of methods:

    • Without any validation:

    registry.register(R.layout.item_a) { view: View -> AViewHolder(view) }

    • With validation that produced class AbstractViewHolder can handle given interface RecyclerItem:

    registry.registerSafe(ItemA::class, R.layout.item_a) { view: View -> AViewHolder(view) }

    • With validation that produced class AbstractViewHolder can handle given interface RecyclerItem and an extension function defined inside class ViewHolderFactoryRegistry:

    registry.apply {
    ItemA::class.register(R.layout.item_a) { view: View -> AViewHolder(view) }
}

    These three calls are equivalent.

    See Also:
    class ViewHolderFactoryRegistry, class AbstractViewHolder, interface RecyclerItem, register, registerSafe, class ViewHolderFactoryRegistry, class ViewHolderFactoryRegistry, interface RecyclerItem, RecyclerItem.viewHolderType, class AbstractViewHolder, class AbstractViewHolder, interface RecyclerItem, class AbstractViewHolder, interface RecyclerItem, class ViewHolderFactoryRegistry

      • ViewHolderFactoryRegistry

        public ViewHolderFactoryRegistry()

        Util class for creating customizable and easy to use ViewHolderFactory.

        registry.registerSafe(ItemA::class, R.layout.item_a) { view: View -> AViewHolder(view) }

        Creates class AbstractViewHolder for given view and viewType.

        Parameters:
        view - View that was created by LayoutInflater using viewType
        viewType - Layout resource id that is equal to some RecyclerItem.viewHolderType from thedata set
